column5: Private guest room in new, luxurious modern two-story home featuring a pool and a hot tub, as well as outdoor bar, three (3) grills and a smoker on our large deck area.  Close to The Domain, Apple campus, IBM campus, Dell campus, GM campus, Samsung campus and more!  Must love cats :-)  UT Campus & Football | SXSW | F1 | ACL | Domain | Apple Campus | IBM Campus | Dell Campus | GM General Motors Campus | Samsung Campus  15-min drive to downtown  >2 guests case-by-case
column8: Room in luxury modern home w/ own bath near Domain
